mainProjects.title: To Do list app
mainProjects.description: Allows users to manage their daily tasks. Uses React and CSS. Features include adding, deleting, and updating tasks, as well as filtering tasks by status (active, completed).
mainProjects.imageAlternativeText: Todo list app in dark theme

mainProjects.title: Planets fact site
mainProjects.description: First project built with React, an interactive site presenting data about planets. Utilized dynamic components and state management to display information through tabs (internal structure, geology, etc.). Responsive interface.
mainProjects.imageAlternativeText: Drawing of Mercury planet with geology and structure description

mainProjects.title: Calculator app
mainProjects.description: Interactive calculator app in JavaScript featuring basic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division). Uses CSS for styling and theme changes.

mainProjects.title: E-commerce product page
mainProjects.description: Development of an e-commerce product page in React, featuring full shopping cart management and an interactive image slider system for product presentation. The project highlights dynamic management of products to add or remove from the cart, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.
mainProjects.imageAlternativeText: Sneakers product page with it pictures and description

secondaryProjects.title: Github user search app
secondaryProjects.description: Creation of an application that allows searching for GitHub users by their username and displaying their information (repos, followers, etc.) using the GitHub REST API. Handling HTTP requests with JavaScript (fetch API).

secondaryProjects.title: Tip calculator app

Choose a percentage (5%, 10%...), write how many of you were eating and it gives you the amount to tip and the total amount per person.

secondaryProjects.title: Officelite coming soon site
secondaryProjects.description: A website for an upcoming fictive project. Two pages with a live countdown timer that ticks every second. On the second page there is a contact form which verify if the fields are correctly fulfilled or not. The contact form also contains a menu with multiples options.

secondaryProjects.title: Maker pre launch landing page
secondaryProjects.description: This is my very first project as a Front-end Developer. Landing page with a form which verifies if the email address is formatted correctly.

schoolProjects.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
schoolProjects.description: Development of the back-end for a book rating site using Node.js, Express, MongoDB and Mongoose. Set up a server to handle CRUD operations and book additions, as well as user account management with secure authentication. Implemented features for image uploading and optimization, and for calculating average ratings.

schoolProjects.title: Sophie Bluel's Portfolio
schoolProjects.description: Design of an interactive web interface for an interior designer's website, incorporating JavaScript to interact with an API. Developed a project showcase page, an admin login interface, and a modal for creating additional projects and uploading media, based on the provided Figma mockups.

schoolProjects.title: Kasa
schoolProjects.description: Implementation of the front-end of an application using React and React Router, including the development of reusable generic components.

schoolProjects.title: Nina Carducci's Portfolio
schoolProjects.description: Optimization of a website's SEO, performance, and accessibility. Analyzed issues with Lighthouse and Wave, implemented recommendations to improve loading speed and SEO, and created a report illustrating the results before and after the changes.

schoolProjects.title: Booki
schoolProjects.description: Creation of a responsive homepage in HTML/CSS based on Figma mockups. Version control with Git, and optimization for various devices.
